title: Reflective XSS at olx.ph

profile.name: OLX
profile.about: OLX is an online classifieds platform that enables its users to create ads and display them on social networks.

vulnerability_information:
Hello,

I would like to report a reflective  XSS  at [https://www.olx.ph](https://www.olx.ph).

## Steps to reproduce
* Visit the following link: [https://www.olx.ph/all-results?q=car&utm_source=Opt_Homepage_Var_0&utm_medium=Search&utm_campaign=toto%27-alert(document.domain)-%27](https://www.olx.ph/all-results?q=car&utm_source=Opt_Homepage_Var_0&utm_medium=Search&utm_campaign=toto%27-alert(document.domain)-%27)
* An XSS should pop-up

{F305078}

## Technical Details
The paramter ```utm_campaign``` don't escape single quote ```'``` that's why the following payload to work: 
```
'-alert(document.domain)-'
```
Please note that the parameter value is  reflected  29 times, 4 times inside JS code, variables were using single quotes.

{F305079}
{F305080}

## Mitigation
Correctly escape and sanitize user input.

## Impact

Session Hijacking and everything related / controlled by JS that could lead to account takeover...

## XSS with cookie:

{F305082}

Best,
Taha Ibrahim DRAIDIA
vulnerability_information_html:
Hello,

I would like to report a reflective XSS at https://www.olx.ph.

Steps to reproduce

  • Visit the following link: https://www.olx.ph/all-results?q=car&utm_source=Opt_Homepage_Var_0&utm_medium=Search&utm_campaign=toto%27-alert(document.domain)-%27
  • An XSS should pop-up

Technical Details

The paramter utm_campaign don't escape single quote ' that's why the following payload to work: 

'-alert(document.domain)-'

Please note that the parameter value is reflected 29 times, 4 times inside JS code, variables were using single quotes.


Mitigation

Correctly escape and sanitize user input.

Impact

Session Hijacking and everything related / controlled by JS that could lead to account takeover...

XSS with cookie:

Best,
Taha Ibrahim DRAIDIA

activities.message:
Hi,

We are deeply grateful for the security issue you shared with us. OLX's staff will we working on this issue to solve it ASAP.

Since we just launched our vulnerability disclosure program, we are currently not awarding bounties or cash rewards for reported vulnerabilities but hope to do so in the near future.

We would like to add you in our Security Hall of Fame site that is hosted in security.olx.com. Could you please provide a profile you would like to link to (social media, HackerOne, etc) in our Hall of Fame entry?

Best regards,

Global Security Infrastructure Team

We are deeply grateful for the security issue you shared with us. OLX's staff will we working on this issue to solve it ASAP.

Since we just launched our vulnerability disclosure program, we are currently not awarding bounties or cash rewards for reported vulnerabilities but hope to do so in the near future.

We would like to add you in our Security Hall of Fame site that is hosted in security.olx.com. Could you please provide a profile you would like to link to (social media, HackerOne, etc) in our Hall of Fame entry?

Best regards,

Global Security Infrastructure Team

activities.message:
Hi Security Team,

Quick update, after rechecking I found out that `utm_campaign` parameter is not the main source of the issue. In fact `path + query of URI` are reflected 4 times inside two javascript variables: `urlNoCategory` and `urlNoLocation` which means if we added a fake parameter `fou` and set the value with this payload `'-alert(document.domain)-'`  the XSS should trigger.

## Details
  
{F308014}

## The first two reflected values

{F308005}

## The second two reflected values

{F308005}

## PoC

{F308008}

## Mitigation

Sanitize user input

## Hall of Fame

First of all, I'am glad to help, you can use the same details I provided  in this report #358456,  Thank you.

If you have any questions just let me know.
Taha Ibrahim DRAIDIA

activities.message:
Hi @bartosz_naumowicz

It seems that the issue has been fixed, shall we close the report as resolved ? Meanwhile I wanted to point out that there is a typo on my last name  [Hall of fame 2018](https://security.olx.com/security-hall-of-fame.html). Here is my full name: **Taha Ibrahim DRAIDIA**.

Regards,
Ibrahim
